19#include "opt_ah.h"
20
21#include "ah.h"
22#include "ah_internal.h"
23
24#include "ar5416/ar5416.h"
25#include "ar5416/ar5416reg.h"
26
27/*
28 * Notify Power Mgt is enabled in self-generated frames.
29 * If requested, force chip awake.
30 *
31 * Returns A_OK if chip is awake or successfully forced awake.
32 *
33 * WARNING WARNING WARNING
34 * There is a problem with the chip where sometimes it will not wake up.
35 */
36static HAL_BOOL
37ar5416SetPowerModeAwake(struct ath_hal *ah, int setChip)
38{
39#define POWER_UP_TIME 200000
40 uint32_t val;
41 int i = 0;
42
43 if (setChip) {
44 /*
45 * Do a Power-On-Reset if OWL is shutdown
46 * the NetBSD driver power-cycles the Cardbus slot
47 * as part of the reset procedure.
48 */
49 if ((OS_REG_READ(ah, AR_RTC_STATUS)
50 & AR_RTC_PM_STATUS_M) == AR_RTC_STATUS_SHUTDOWN) {
51 if (!ar5416SetResetReg(ah, HAL_RESET_POWER_ON))
52 goto bad;
53 }
54
55 OS_REG_SET_BIT(ah, AR_RTC_FORCE_WAKE, AR_RTC_FORCE_WAKE_EN);
56 OS_DELAY(50); /* Give chip the chance to awake */
57
58 for (i = POWER_UP_TIME / 50; i != 0; i--) {
59 val = OS_REG_READ(ah, AR_RTC_STATUS) & AR_RTC_STATUS_M;
60 if (val == AR_RTC_STATUS_ON)
61 break;
62 OS_DELAY(50);
63 OS_REG_SET_BIT(ah, AR_RTC_FORCE_WAKE, AR_RTC_FORCE_WAKE_EN);
64 }
65 bad:
66 if (i == 0) {
67#ifdef AH_DEBUG
68 ath_hal_printf(ah, "%s: Failed to wakeup in %ums\n",
69 __func__, POWER_UP_TIME/1000);
70#endif
71 return AH_FALSE;
72 }
73 }
74
75 OS_REG_CLR_BIT(ah, AR_STA_ID1, AR_STA_ID1_PWR_SAV);
76 return AH_TRUE;
77#undef POWER_UP_TIME
78}
79
80/*
81 * Notify Power Mgt is disabled in self-generated frames.
82 * If requested, force chip to sleep.
83 */
84static void
85ar5416SetPowerModeSleep(struct ath_hal *ah, int setChip)
86{
87 OS_REG_SET_BIT(ah, AR_STA_ID1, AR_STA_ID1_PWR_SAV);
88 if (setChip) {
89 /* Clear the RTC force wake bit to allow the mac to sleep */
90 OS_REG_CLR_BIT(ah, AR_RTC_FORCE_WAKE, AR_RTC_FORCE_WAKE_EN);
91 OS_REG_WRITE(ah, AR_RC, AR_RC_AHB|AR_RC_HOSTIF);
92 /* Shutdown chip. Active low */
93 OS_REG_CLR_BIT(ah, AR_RTC_RESET, AR_RTC_RESET_EN);
94 }
95}
96
97/*
98 * Notify Power Management is enabled in self-generating
99 * fames. If request, set power mode of chip to
100 * auto/normal. Duration in units of 128us (1/8 TU).
101 */
102static void
103ar5416SetPowerModeNetworkSleep(struct ath_hal *ah, int setChip)
104{
105 OS_REG_SET_BIT(ah, AR_STA_ID1, AR_STA_ID1_PWR_SAV);
106
107 if (setChip)
108 OS_REG_CLR_BIT(ah, AR_RTC_FORCE_WAKE, AR_RTC_FORCE_WAKE_EN);
109}
110
111/*
112 * Set power mgt to the requested mode, and conditionally set
113 * the chip as well
114 */
115HAL_BOOL
116ar5416SetPowerMode(struct ath_hal *ah, HAL_POWER_MODE mode, int setChip)
117{
118 struct ath_hal_5212 *ahp = AH5212(ah);
119#ifdef AH_DEBUG
120 static const char* modes[] = {
121 "AWAKE",
122 "FULL-SLEEP",
123 "NETWORK SLEEP",
124 "UNDEFINED"
125 };
126#endif
127 int status = AH_TRUE;
128 if (!setChip)
129 return AH_TRUE;
130
131 HALDEBUG(ah, HAL_DEBUG_POWER, "%s: %s -> %s (%s)\n", __func__,
132 modes[ahp->ah_powerMode], modes[mode], setChip ? "set chip " : "");
133 switch (mode) {
134 case HAL_PM_AWAKE:
135 status = ar5416SetPowerModeAwake(ah, setChip);
136 break;
137 case HAL_PM_FULL_SLEEP:
138 ar5416SetPowerModeSleep(ah, setChip);
139 break;
140 case HAL_PM_NETWORK_SLEEP:
141 ar5416SetPowerModeNetworkSleep(ah, setChip);
142 break;
143 default:
144 HALDEBUG(ah, HAL_DEBUG_ANY, "%s: unknown power mode 0x%x\n",
145 __func__, mode);
146 return AH_FALSE;
147 }
148 ahp->ah_powerMode = mode;
149 return status;
150}
151
152/*
153 * Return the current sleep mode of the chip
154 */
155HAL_POWER_MODE
156ar5416GetPowerMode(struct ath_hal *ah)
157{
158 int mode = OS_REG_READ(ah, AR_RTC_STATUS);
159 switch (mode & AR_RTC_PM_STATUS_M) {
160 case AR_RTC_STATUS_ON:
161 case AR_RTC_STATUS_WAKEUP:
162 return HAL_PM_AWAKE;
163 case AR_RTC_STATUS_SLEEP:
164 return HAL_PM_NETWORK_SLEEP;
165 case AR_RTC_STATUS_SHUTDOWN:
166 return HAL_PM_FULL_SLEEP;
167 default:
168 HALDEBUG(ah, HAL_DEBUG_ANY,
169 "%s: unknown power mode, RTC_STATUS 0x%x\n",
170 __func__, mode);
171 return HAL_PM_UNDEFINED;
172 }
173}
